TextView.android:text: We can’t help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
– Ronald Reagan
I hated every minute of training, but I said, Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
– Muhammad Ali
We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
– Joseph Campbell
Only the mediocre are always at their best.
– Jean Giraudoux
What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
– Plutarch
What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
– Ralph Waldo Emerson
As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
– John F. Kennedy
If you’re going to do something tonight that you’ll be sorry for tomorrow morning, sleep late.
– Henny Youngman
When the sun is shining I can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.
Wilma Rudolph
It’s amazing that the amount of news that happens in the world every day always just exactly fits the newspaper.
Jerry Seinfeld
When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.
William Arthur Ward
If I had to live my life again, I’d make the same mistakes, only sooner.
– Tallulah Bankhead
The only journey is the one within.
– Rainer Maria Rilke
I no doubt deserved my enemies, but I don’t believe I deserved my friends.
– Walt Whitman
It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
– Tony Robins
It is always the simple that produces the marvelous.
– Amelia Barr
The truth is you don’t know what is going to happen tomorrow. Life is a crazy ride, and nothing is guaranteed.
– Eminem
The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
– William Morris
A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.
– George Bernard Shaw
Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
– Albert Einstein
If you can dream it, you can do it.
– Walt Disney
A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
– Ayn Rand
ou have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
– Albert Einstein
I know where I’m going and I know the truth, and I don’t have to be what you want me to be. I’m free to be what I want.
– Muhammad Ali
One finds limits by pushing them.
– Herbert Simon
You just can’t beat the person who never gives up.
– Babe Ruth
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
– William James
You can’t build a reputation on what you are going to do.
– Henry Ford
Any idiot can face a crisis – it’s day to day living that wears you out.
– Anton Chekhov
I’m a great believer in luck, and I find the harder I work, the more I have of it.
– Thomas Jefferson
Talent hits a target no one else can hit; Genius hits a target no one else can see.
– Maya Angelou
Do one thing every day that scares you.
– Eleanor Roosevelt
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
– C. S. Lewis
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
– Eleanor Roosevelt
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
– Arthur Ashe
I’d rather attempt to do something great and fail than to attempt to do nothing and succeed.
– Robert H. Schuller
Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
– Ralph Waldo Emerson
Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.
– Henry Ford
Never tell people how to do things. Tell them what to do and they will surprise you with their ingenuity.
– George S. Patton
The difficulty lies not so much in developing new ideas as in escaping from old ones.
– John Maynard Keynes
When you are content to be simply yourself and don’t compare or compete, everybody will respect you.
– Lao Tzu
The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
– Mahatma Gandhi
Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.
– Lao Tzu
Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
– Michael Jordan
An entrepreneur tends to bite off a little more than he can chew hoping he’ll quickly learn how to chew it.
– Roy Ash
Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
– Mahatma Gandhi
Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
– Mahatma Gandhi
We may stumble and fall but shall rise again; it should be enough if we did not run away from the battle.
– Mahatma Gandhi
You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
– Zig Ziglar
The biggest risk is not taking any risk. The only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.
– Mark Zuckerberg
If you do not enjoy what you are doing, you will never be good at it.
– Luke Parker
The quality of your thinking determines the quality of your life.
– A.R. Bernard
Age is no guarantee of maturity.
– Lawana Blackwell
The answer lies within ourselves. If we can’t find peace and happiness there, it’s not going to come from the outside.
– Tenzin Palmo
Go after your dream, no matter how unattainable others think it is.
– Linda Mastandrea
You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
– A P J Abdul Kalam
By being yourself you put something wonderful in the world that was not there before.
– Edwin Elliot
You cannot believe in God until you believe in yourself.
– Swami Vivekanand
Take responsibility for yourself.., because no one’s going to take responsibility for you.
– Tyra Banks
We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
– Mother Teresa
Simplicity is not a simple thing.
– Charles Chaplin
You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
– Mahatma Gandhi
Decide that you want it more than you are afraid of it.
– Bill Cosby
Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
– Mahatma Gandhi
Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much.
– Oscar Wilde
I think original voices get noticed. But most importantly I think you should have a story to tell.
– Chetan Bhagat
The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
– Mary Pickford
Education is the manifestation of perfection already in a man.
– Swami Vivekanand
Once we decide we have to do something, we can go miles ahead.
– Narendra Modi
To be a great champion you must believe you are the best. If you’re not, pretend you are.
– Muhammad Ali
All that we are is the result of what we have thought. The mind is everything. What we think we become.
– Gautam Buddha
Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
– Dalai Lama
We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
– Oscar Wilde
Leadership is hard to define and good leadership even harder. But if you can get people to follow you to the ends of the earth, you are a great leader.
– Indira Nooyi
Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
– Eleanor Roosevelt
I have never tried to compare myself to anyone else.
– Sachin Tendulkar
Mind is never a problem. Mindset is.
– Narender Modi
Anything I’ve done that was ultimately worthwhile initially scared me to death.
– Betty Bender
It’s important to learn to laugh at ourselves, don’t take life too seriously.
– Geri Halliwell
The day I am not able to fly will be a sad day for me.
– Ratan Tata
It’s important to give it all you have while you have the chance.
– Shania Twain
